mapper.select: SELECT common_detail_code AS code , LOWER(common_detail_name) AS name , common_detail_status AS status , common_detail_display AS display FROM common_detail WHERE REGEXP_REPLACE(common_detail_code, '[0-9]') = #{value} ORDER BY common_detail_display

SELECT wv.work_no AS "workNo" , wv.emp_id AS "empId" , TO_CHAR(wv.work_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "workDate" , wv.work_start AS "workStart" , wv.work_end AS "workEnd" , TO_CHAR(cm.cmt_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "cmtDate" , cm.work_bgn AS "cmtStart" , cm.work_end AS "cmtEnd" , emp.emp_no AS "empNo" , emp.emp_dept AS "empDept" , v.vacation_type AS vctnType FROM WORK_VIEW wv LEFT JOIN CMT_MNG cm ON wv.emp_id = cm.emp_no LEFT JOIN employees emp ON wv.emp_id = emp.emp_id LEFT JOIN vacation v ON wv.emp_id = v.vacation_leave WHERE wv.emp_id = #{empId}
